verses.name: Psalms 145:7
verses.text: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.

verses.name: Psalms 145:8
verses.text: The Lord is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.

verses.name: Psalms 145:9
verses.text: The Lord is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.

verses.name: Psalms 145:10
verses.text: All thy works shall praise thee, O Lord; and thy saints shall bless thee.

verses.name: Psalms 145:11
verses.text: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;

verses.name: Psalms 145:12
verses.text: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.
